dmca.title: Amended Request
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

The URLs in question are currently not accessible as of 2:53:42 p.m.
(GMT-6) on October 27, 2006.

 

Legal Response Team

 


________________________________

From: SweetWitch, Molly Wens [mailto:kitton66@gmail.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, October 25, 2006 11:47 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Amended Request
Subject: Amended Request


Amended to reflect the additional stories located on Starznaked.com and
that website's complete information.
 
Pursuant to your request for a DMCA notification the following
information is provide to you. 

1. The title of the copyrighted material
2. The original date of posting
3. The original URL of the site posted to
4. The URL of the stolen material
5. The Name of the Domain Operator
6. The name of the Copyright Holder 
7. The Email address which the Copyright Holder can be reached

 
On 10/25/06, Molly Wens <molly.wens@gmail.com> wrote: 

        *        A physical or electronic signature of a person
("Complaining Party") authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an
exclusive right that is claimed to be infringed; 

        I am Molly Wens, AKA SweetWitch, the author and exclusive owner
of all rights to the stories The Spell of Appalachia, Chapter 1 and The
Long Road, Chapter 2 and I am acting on my own behalf.

        *        Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have
been infringed, or if multiple copyrighted works at a single online site
are covered by a single notification, a representative list of such
works at that site; 

The stories in question and the reasons for this email are: 
 
The Spell of Appalachia, Chapter 1 originally posted on 10/06/2006 at
http://english.literotica.com/stories/showstory.php?id=278610 
 
now illegally posted as of 10/11/2006 at
http://starznaked.com/2006/10/11/the_spell_of_appalachia_ch_01/#more-594
 
The Long Road, Chapter 2 originally posted on 09/17/2006 at
http://english.literotica.com/stories/showstory.php?id=274880
 
now illegally posted as of 09/25/2006 at
http://starznaked.com/2006/09/25/the_long_road_ch_02/#more-26
 

        *        Identification of the material that is claimed to be
infringing or to be the subject of infringing activity and that is to be
removed or access to which is to be disabled, and information reasonably
sufficient to permit the service provider to locate the material; 

        The website that has stolen my work is Starznaked.com
<http://starznaked.com/> .  

 
Registration Service Provided By: HIGH QUALITY HOST COMPANY
Contact: +1.6462130098

Domain Name: STARZNAKED.COM 

Registrant:
    My! Media
    Andrew Johns        ( me@exploy.name)
    Burning str, 26, 46
    Nashville
    TN,37206
    US
    Tel. +615.2690029103

Creation Date: 14-Nov-2002  
Expiration Date: 14-Nov-2007

Domain servers in listed order:
    ns2.exploy.name
    ns1.exploy.name


Administrative Contact:
    My! Media
    Andrew Johns        ( me@exploy.name)
    Burning str, 26, 46
    Nashville
    TN,37206
    US
    Tel. +615.2690029103

Technical Contact:
    My! Media
    Andrew Johns        ( me@exploy.name)
    Burning str, 26, 46
    Nashville
    TN,37206
    US
    Tel. +615.2690029103

Billing Contact:
    My! Media
    Andrew Johns        ( me@exploy.name <mailto:me@exploy.name> )
    Burning str, 26, 46
    Nashville
    TN,37206
    US
    Tel. +615.2690029103

Status:ACTIVE
 

        Please note the pornographic imagery on the top of this and all
pages associated with this site.  I have no desire to have my work
associated with this type of material.

        *        Information reasonably sufficient to permit the service
provider to contact the Complaining Party, such as an address, telephone
number, and, if available, an electronic mail address at which the
complaining party may be contacted; 

        I may be reached at 217-652-0428 or my email address
molly.wens@gmail.com.

        *        
                A statement that the Complaining Party has a good faith
belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not
authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law; 

        I, Molly Wens, AKA SweetWitch, Sole Author and Owner of all
rights to and copyrights of The Spell of Appalachia, Chapter 1 and The
Long Road, Chapter 2, do not now give nor have I ever given my
permission or authorization to Andrew Johns, My! Media, High Quality
Host Company, or any other persons or entities in any way involved with
Starznaked.com <http://starznaked.com/>  to publish or post my story.

        *        A statement that the information in the notification is
accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that the Complaining Party is
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed. 

        I, Molly Wens, AKA SweetWitch, Sole Author and Owner of all
rights to and copyrights of The Spell of Appalachia, Chapter 1 and The
Long Road, Chapter 2, do hereby attest that the information in this
statement of notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, am
acting on my own behalf. 
         
        I await your reply.
        
         
        Molly Wens, a.k.a. SweetWitch.
